databaseConfig.sql: SELECT KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.KS_NIYAKU_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.MS_KENSA_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.SEND_FLAG, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.VESSEL_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.DATA_NO, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.USER_KEY, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.RENEW_DATE, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.RENEW_USER_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.TS FROM KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK

SELECT KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.KS_NIYAKU_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.MS_KENSA_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.SEND_FLAG, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.VESSEL_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.DATA_NO, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.USER_KEY, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.RENEW_DATE, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.RENEW_USER_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.TS FROM KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK WHERE KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.MS_KENSA_ID = :MS_KENSA_ID

SELECT KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.KS_NIYAKU_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.MS_KENSA_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.SEND_FLAG, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.VESSEL_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.DATA_NO, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.USER_KEY, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.RENEW_DATE, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.RENEW_USER_ID, KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.TS FROM KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK WHERE KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK.KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK_ID = :KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK_ID

INSERT INTO KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK( KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK_ID, KS_NIYAKU_ID, MS_KENSA_ID,
SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES( :KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK_ID, :KS_NIYAKU_ID, :MS_KENSA_ID, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :DATA_NO, :USER_KEY, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK SET KS_NIYAKU_ID = :KS_NIYAKU_ID, MS_KENSA_ID = :MS_KENSA_ID, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID WHERE (KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK_ID = :KS_NIYAKU_KENSA_LINK_ID) AND (TS = :TS)
